participant_1.background:
I post on reddit often.
I am an insurance salesman.
I love to ride my bike on the weekend.
I live alone in my condo.
My favorite color is blue.

participant_2.background:
I like to create art.
My favorite band is ween.
I love to eat sushi and pizza.
I am an older guy.
I love to work in my garden.

content.text: Hi! I'm [your name]. What's your name?
Hi! My name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you! What do you do for fun?
I like to create art, listen to music, and eat sushi.
Sushi is delicious! What's your favorite kind?
I love salmon sushi, but I also love tuna and shrimp sushi.
I love salmon sushi too! What do you like to create art with?
I like to use acrylic paints and watercolors. I also like to sculpt with clay.
I've never tried sculpting with clay, but it sounds like it would be fun. Do you have any sculptures that you're proud of?
Yes, I have a few sculptures that I'm proud of. I have a sculpture of a cat that I made for my wife. She loves it.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to see it sometime.
I'll be sure to show you it next time you see me.
Great! So, what kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to a variety of music, but my favorite band is Ween.
I've never heard of Ween. What kind of music do they play?
They play a variety of music, but they're best known for their psychedelic rock and alternative rock.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check them out.
I think you'll like them.
I'm sure I will. So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm an older guy, so I'm retired now. But when I was working, I was a salesman.
Oh, that must have been interesting. What kind of things did you sell?
I sold insurance. It was a good job, but I'm glad I'm retired now.
I can imagine. I'm glad you're enjoying your retirement.
Thanks! I am. I'm really enjoying being able to spend more time with my family and friends.
That's great. I'm sure they appreciate it.
They do. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to ride my bike, play video games, and watch movies.
Riding your bike sounds like fun. I used to ride my bike a lot when I was younger.
It is fun! I love going on long rides, especially when the weather is nice.
I can imagine. So, what kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but my favorites are action movies, comedies, and horror movies.
I like action movies too. They're always so exciting.
I know, right? They're the best. So, what do you think of my profile?
I think it's great! You seem like a really interesting person.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
